### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)) and offshore pump(position (107.5, -33.5))

### Copper plate factory at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace(position (60.0, -60.0)) and burner inserter(position (60.5, -61.5))

### Pipe network at position(107.5, -34.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position (107.5, -33.5)) and multiple pipes

### Electricity network at position(119.5, -30.5)
Consists of small electric pole(position (119.5, -30.5)) and steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5))

### Belt network at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of two belts(position (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using boiler or steam engine
- Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel to operate correctly
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a fluid system

### Errors when refueling the boiler
- Make sure to have coal in the inventory to refuel the boiler

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
- `transport-belt`: 8
- `small-electric-pole`: 1
- `pipe`: 20
- `stone-furnace`: 1
- `wood`: 7
- `copper-ore`: 20
- `iron-plate`: 613
- `copper-plate`: 5
- `copper-cable`: 2
- `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
